name: Domino Rally (itch)
description:
You must make the green domino tile fall to the floor!! Select between Domino Tiles and Marbles using the upper options menu and put them in the stage by tapping on the floor. You can rotate or delete them using the bottom options menu. When you are ready to try your rally just click the Play button!! Available in English, Spanish and Portuguese.

-----

Game made at Global Game Jam 2018 - Buenos Aires, Argentina
https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/domino-rally
